div.head:
Embleme 26. Of the Secrets of Nature.
The tree of life is the fruit of humane wisedome.

lg.l: To greater wisedome man cannot attaine,
Than health with wealth to acquire, if not in vainevain:
Shee in her right hand length of dayesdays extends,
Her left vast heaps of treasure comprehend;
To him that shall espouse her as a wife
Shee (as the tree) will yeild the fruit of life.
